text.name: Command : Meltdown
text.desc:
If the main target has [Combustion] or [Burst], Final Power +1
[BeforeAttack] Deal +1% damage for every 1 ([Burst] Potency + [Burst] Count) on the main target (max 15%)
[EndSkill] Gain 4 [CuredFilm]
[EndSkill] Heal self and 1 ally with the least HP percentage by 15% of this unit's max HP
- If this unit is at max HP, heal 2 other allies instead
[EndSkill] Heal 10 SP for 2 allies, including this unit, with the lowest SP

text.name: Command : Meltdown
text.desc:
If the main target has [Combustion] or [Burst], Final Power +<style="highlight">2
[BeforeAttack] Deal +1% damage for every 1 ([Burst] Potency + [Burst] Count) on the main target (max 15%)
<style="highlight">- If this unit has [CuredFilm], multiply this effect and its maximum cap by 1.5
[EndSkill] Gain <style="highlight">7 [CuredFilm]
[EndSkill] Heal self and 1 ally with the least HP percentage by <style="highlight">20% of this unit's max HP
- If this unit is at max HP, heal 2 other allies instead
[EndSkill] Heal 10 SP for 2 allies, including this unit, with the lowest SP

text.name: Command : Meltdown
text.desc:
If the main target has [Combustion] or [Burst], Final Power +<style="highlight">3
[BeforeAttack] Deal +1% damage for every 1 ([Burst] Potency + [Burst] Count) on the main target (max <style="highlight">25%)
- If this unit has [CuredFilm], multiply this effect and its maximum cap by <style="highlight">2
[EndSkill] Gain <style="highlight">10 [CuredFilm]
[EndSkill] Heal self and 1 ally with the least HP percentage by <style="highlight">30% of this unit's max HP
- If this unit is at max HP, heal 2 other allies instead
[EndSkill] Heal <style="highlight">15 SP for 2 allies, including this unit, with the lowest SP

passiveList.name: Doctor
passiveList.desc:
Turn Start: heal self and 1 ally with the lowest HP percentage by ([CuredFilm] Stack)% of this unit's max HP
- If this unit is at max HP, heal 2 other allies with the lowest HP percentages instead
- If the heal-receiving units are at 25% or lower HP, or are Staggered, multiply this effect's healing by 1.5

Turn End: if the last E.G.O Skill Faust used during this Encounter was Command : Meltdown, lose only 1 Stack of [CuredFilm] at Turn End instead
- This effect activates in the same turn the E.G.O Skill is used

text.name: Command : Meltdown
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
[BeforeAttack] At 4+ highest Reson., gain +1 Atk Weight
[EndSkill] Gain 4 [CuredFilm]
[EndSkill] If this Skill's damage did not Stagger or kill any target, take HP damage equal to 20% of this unit's max HP, and gain Shield equal to HP damage taken due to this effect
- This damage does not kill this unit. Max out the [CuredFilm] Stack at Turn End and gain 2 [AttackDmgUp] next turn (once per turn)

text.name: Command : Meltdown
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
<style="highlight">If main target has 6+ ([Burst] Potency + [Burst] Count), Base Power +1
[BeforeAttack] At <style="highlight">3+ highest Reson., gain +1 Atk Weight
[EndSkill] Gain <style="highlight">7 [CuredFilm]
[EndSkill] If this Skill's damage did not Stagger or kill any target, take HP damage equal to 20% of this unit's max HP, and gain Shield equal to HP damage taken due to this effect
- This damage does not kill this unit. Max out the [CuredFilm] Stack at Turn End and gain 2 [AttackDmgUp] next turn (once per turn)

text.name: Command : Meltdown
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
<style="highlight">Base Power +1 for every 6 ([Burst] Potency + [Burst] Count) on the main target (max 2)
<style="highlight">[BeforeAttack] Gain +1 Atk Weight for every 3 highest Reson. (max 2)
[EndSkill] Gain <style="highlight">10 [CuredFilm]
[EndSkill] If this Skill's damage did not Stagger or kill any target, take HP damage equal to 20% of this unit's max HP, and gain Shield equal to <style="highlight">(HP damage taken due to this effect x 2)
- This damage does not kill this unit. Max out the [CuredFilm] Stack at Turn End and gain 2 [AttackDmgUp] next turn (once per turn)
coinDescs: <style="highlight">[OnStartCoin] If this Skill's damage did not Stagger or kill any target, deal +30% damage
